title: Mobile-Based Information Literacy Education Using Whole-Brain Learning Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Education for professionals focusing on applying information search/analysis/utilization skills to mathematical problem-solving, with smartphone-centric accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can select three or more credible sources from diverse information channels to solve given math problems
Learners can write a report presenting problem-solving solutions by analyzing collected data through visual/numerical methods
Learners identify incorrect information with over 90% accuracy by applying information evaluation criteria (accuracy, reliability, timeliness) in mobile environments

resources: Open-Source Dataset for Mathematical Problem Solving
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
